summary: The East Empire Company will now launch a small landing force to assist in a frontal assault.
descriptionHtml:
Firstly, it is important that you ACTIVATE THIS MOD AT STAGE 7 OF Rise in the East! Otherwise, the battle will occur beforehand.

Now, why was it that you were sent alone to assault Japhet's Folly? Didn't they know your survival chance would be 2 to 1? Well, now its different!

A small landing force consisting of 10 men will assist you (or distract the enemies, depending on how you approach the quest stage) in the assault on Japhet's Folly. But be careful, eight Blood Horkers will be dispatched to rid the island of the Mercenaries, so act fast or they may be overwhelmed!

And don't worry, when you leave the Mercenaries will find their way off the Island. Unless their dead.
author: kvatchcount

files.name: Japhet's Folly Assault V.1.0. - The Release
